result.arabic_text: وَمَن يُطِعِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَيَخۡشَ ٱللَّهَ وَيَتَّقۡهِ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَآئِزُونَ
result.translation: Uwo wese rero, yumviye Imana Allah hamwe n’Intumwa yayo mu kwubahiriza amabwirizwa, akamana impungenge zitewe no gutinya guhanwa n’Imana Allah, uyo rero ari mu bantu benintsinzi y’Ubwami bw’ijuru.
